footerDescription: Connecting travelers for safer and more enjoyable journeys. Find trusted companions for flights and reliable airport pickup services.

guidelines.title: Community Guidelines
guidelines.subtitle: Building a safe, respectful, and trustworthy platform for everyone

overview.title: Our Community
overview.content: WingCompanion connects travelers to create safer, more enjoyable journeys. Our community guidelines ensure that everyone can participate with confidence, knowing they're part of a respectful and trustworthy platform.

respect.title: Treat Everyone with Respect
respect.content: Communicate politely and considerately. Remember that behind every profile is a real person deserving of dignity and kindness.

discrimination.title: Zero Tolerance for Discrimination
discrimination.content: Discrimination based on race, religion, gender, nationality, age, sexual orientation, or any other characteristic is strictly prohibited.

harassment.title: No Harassment or Abuse
harassment.content: Harassment, bullying, threats, or any form of abusive behavior will result in immediate account suspension.

verification.title: Complete Profile Verification
verification.content: Verify your identity to build trust with other community members. Verified profiles receive priority in search results.

meetings.title: Safe Meeting Practices
meetings.content: Meet in public places, inform trusted contacts of your plans, and trust your instincts if something feels wrong.

personal.title: Protect Personal Information
personal.content: Never share sensitive information like passport numbers, home address, or financial details through the platform.

reliability.title: Be Reliable and Punctual
reliability.content: Honor your commitments. If you must cancel, do so as early as possible and communicate clearly with affected parties.

payment.title: Transparent Pricing
payment.content: Be clear about costs upfront. No hidden fees or last-minute price changes. All payments must go through the platform.

quality.title: Provide Quality Service
quality.content: Whether offering or requesting services, maintain high standards and treat others as you would want to be treated.

violations.title: Report Violations
violations.content: If you experience or witness violations of these guidelines, report them immediately through the app or contact support.

consequences.title: Consequences
consequences.content: Violations may result in warnings, temporary suspension, or permanent account termination depending on severity.

appeals.title: Appeals Process
appeals.content: If you believe action was taken in error, you can appeal through our support system within 30 days.

manageAccount: Manage your account information and preferences
verificationDialogDesc: Please provide references to your identification documents. This helps us verify your identity and build trust in our community.
documentReferencesPlaceholder: Please provide document references that can be used to verify your identity...
documentReferencesHelper: e.g., Passport number, Driver's license number, etc.
pleaseLoginProfile: Please log in to view your profile.

validation.firstNameMax: First name must be less than 50 characters
validation.firstNameRegex: First name can only contain letters and spaces
validation.lastNameMax: Last name must be less than 50 characters
validation.lastNameRegex: Last name can only contain letters and spaces
validation.phoneNumberFormat: Phone number must be in format +64XXXXXXXX
validation.emergencyContactLength: Emergency contact name must be between 2 and 100 characters
validation.emergencyPhoneFormat: Emergency phone must be in format +64XXXXXXXX
validation.documentReferencesMin: Document references must be at least 10 characters
validation.documentReferencesMax: Document references must be less than 500 characters
validation.passwordMin: Password must be at least 6 characters

emergency.warningMessage: ðŸš¨ This will immediately notify your emergency contact, platform administrators, and any matched users. Only use for genuine emergencies.
emergency.responseInfo: Emergency contacts will be notified immediately via email and SMS. Platform administrators will also be alerted.
emergency.noHistoryDesc: You haven't triggered any emergency alerts yet.
emergency.resolveDesc: Please provide details about how this emergency was resolved.
emergency.resolutionPlaceholder: Describe how the emergency was resolved...

terms.title: Terms of Service
terms.subtitle: Legal agreement for using the WingCompanion platform

acceptance.title: 1. Acceptance of Terms
acceptance.content: By accessing and using WingCompanion, you accept and agree to be bound by these Terms of Service. If you do not agree to these terms, you may not use our services.

description.title: 2. Service Description
description.content: WingCompanion is a platform that connects Chinese professionals in Auckland for flight companionship and airport pickup services. We facilitate connections between users but are not a party to the actual service agreements.

eligibility.title: 3. User Eligibility
eligibility.age: You must be at least 18 years old to use our services.
eligibility.verification: You must provide accurate information and complete identity verification.
eligibility.compliance: You must comply with all applicable laws and regulations.

accounts.title: 4. User Accounts
accounts.responsibility: You are responsible for maintaining the confidentiality of your account credentials.
accounts.accuracy: You must provide accurate and current information during registration.
accounts.notification: You must notify us immediately of any unauthorized use of your account.

conduct.title: 5. Prohibited Conduct
conduct.illegal: Using the platform for illegal activities or harassment
conduct.fraud: Providing false information or engaging in fraudulent activities
conduct.interference: Interfering with the platform's operation or other users' experience
conduct.violation: Violating these terms or community guidelines

payments.title: 6. Payment Terms
payments.escrow: Payments are held in escrow until service completion
payments.fees: Platform fees may apply to certain transactions
payments.disputes: Payment disputes will be resolved according to our dispute resolution process
payments.refunds: Refunds are subject to our refund policy

liability.title: 7. Limitation of Liability
liability.disclaimer: WingCompanion is not liable for the quality, safety, or legality of services provided by users
liability.maximum: Our maximum liability is limited to the amount of fees paid by you
liability.exclusion: We exclude liability for indirect, consequential, or punitive damages

privacy.title: 8. Privacy Policy
privacy.content: Your privacy is important to us. Please review our Privacy Policy to understand how we collect, use, and protect your information.

termination.title: 9. Termination
termination.user: You may terminate your account at any time by contacting support
termination.platform: We may suspend or terminate accounts that violate these terms
termination.effect: Upon termination, your access to the platform will cease immediately

changes.title: 10. Changes to Terms
changes.content: We reserve the right to modify these terms at any time. Users will be notified of significant changes via email or platform notifications.

governing.title: 11. Governing Law
governing.content: These terms are governed by the laws of New Zealand. Any disputes will be resolved in Auckland courts.

contact.title: 12. Contact Information
contact.content: For questions about these terms, contact us at legal@networkingapp.co.nz

admin.loginRequired: Please log in to access the admin dashboard.

dashboard.title: Admin Dashboard
dashboard.subtitle: Manage users, verifications, disputes, and monitor platform health
